card.name: Murktears, the Thrum
card.text: Flying, vigilance The second spell you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control that entered this turn. {3}, {T}: Exile another target nontoken creature, then return that card to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Treacleblossom
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a tapped 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Daughters of Conclusion
card.text: Whenever another creature enters, its controller may pay {1}. If they don't, its controller sacrifices it.

card.name: Winged Beckoner
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token. You may have any number of those tokens enter tapped and attacking.

card.name: Stagnant Vestige
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, exile up to one target spell or nonland permanent. If you do, tap this creature. For as long as that card remains exiled, its controller may cast it by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost.

card.name: Host of the Great Return
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, for each non-Aura, non-Equipment, nonland permanent card in your graveyard with the least mana value among cards in your graveyard, return that card to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter on it. It's a 5/5 Spirit creature in addition to its other types.

card.name: Zhalle, Protracted Agony
card.text: Double strike, lifelink When Zhalle enters, for each player whose life total is less than 10, that player's life total becomes 10. Whenever a player gains life during your turn, if it's the first time that player gained life this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Equivalence
card.text: Destroy each nonland permanent with the same mana value as any other nonland permanent in play.

card.name: Root of Souls
card.text: Whenever a creature dies, return it from its owner's graveyard to the battlefield under that player's control at the beginning of their next end step. {T}, Exile a creature card from a graveyard: Add {C}{C}{C} and create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Soulcaptor Filigrist
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice one or more creatures, choose one that hasn't been chosen this turn. X is the number of creatures sacrificed. • Create X 1/1 Spirit creature tokens. • Create an X/X Construct artifact creature token.

card.name: Lien, Heir of Amel
card.text: Lien can't attack alone. After blockers are declared, if Lien is attacking, choose a blocked creature you control at random. That creature gains first strike, deathtouch, and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you draw a card and lose 1 life" until end of turn.

card.name: Unnerving Hush
card.text: Paragon — This spell costs {W} less to cast if you control a creature with power different than each other creature's power. Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Kollept, the Culmination
card.text: Trample Burgeon 3 (This creature enters with an additional three +1/+1 counters if mana from a nonland source was spent to cast it.) Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Kollept, put that many +1/+1 counters on each other creature you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Miroa, the Lost Self
card.text: Insanity — When Miroa enters and at the beginning of each end step, it becomes a copy of any creature on the battlefield except it has this ability if two or more cards were put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn. Otherwise, mill two cards.

card.name: Maddening Eventuality
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. • Target player gains control of target activated ability or triggered ability. (They don't choose new targets for it.)

card.name: Relai, Burdened Queen
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, resound. (Trigger any number of resound abilities among permanents you control. Do this only once each turn.) Creatures you control have "Resound — Untap up to one target nonland permanent."

card.name: Vaporous Monument
card.text: When this artifact enters, surveil 2, then draw two cards. You gain 2 life. {W}, {T}: Exile target creature until another creature enters. Activate only if no cards are exiled with this artifact and only during your turn.

card.name: Fraywing Thief
card.text: Haste, reach Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a tapped Treasure token. Sacrifice an artifact: This creature gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Crypt Tree
card.text: When this creature dies or leaves your graveyard during your turn, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Matriarch Vagabond
card.text: {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and create a tapped Treasure token. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: Reclaim Soul
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. When you do, if its mana value was 3 or less, target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Strange Mercy
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target non-Spirit creature. • Each of up to three target creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Insatiable Mists
card.text: When this creature enters, target opponent discards a card. If they can't, they sacrifice a creature. If they can't, they lose 3 life.

card.name: Elegy Priestess
card.text: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you control no Spirit tokens, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Catacomb Stalker
card.text: Ward—Sacrifice a creature. Cull (You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard by exiling it. Each token you sacrifice pays for {1} to cast it this way. The copy becomes a token.)

card.name: Elaye, the Lofty
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent loses life outside of combat for the first time on each of your turns, put a +1/+1 counter on Elaye. The same is true for the first time an opponent sacrifices a creature or discards a card each turn.

card.name: Grieving Stones
card.text: This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color or surveil 1. {T}: Add {C} or one mana of the chosen color. (If no color was chosen, this ability only adds {C}.)

card.name: Treasure ELV
card.text: {T}: Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: An Echo and a Light
card.text: (As this Elegy enters and whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield during your turn, add a lore counter. Sacrifice this Elegy after III.) I — Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. II — Draw a card and lose 2 life. Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life. III — Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Olnuv, Calamity Sworn
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Until end of turn, target creature, instant, or sorcery card in your graveyard gains cull. The cull cost is equal to that card's mana cost. (You may cast a copy of that card from your graveyard by exiling it. Each token you sacrifice pays for {1} to cast it this way. A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

card.name: False Dreamscapes
card.text: Search any number of opponents' libraries for up to three cards with different names and exile them. An opponent chooses one or more of those cards. You may play the chosen cards for as long as they remain exiled, and mana of any type may be spent to cast those spells.

card.name: Pneuma, Fatal Superposition
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile two creature cards put into your graveyard this turn. As Pneuma enters or attacks, you may have it become a copy of a card exiled with it, except its name is Pneuma, Fatal Superposition, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has this ability.

card.name: Exorcist's Recall
card.text: Target opponent mills half their library, rounded up. You may cast up to one card from among cards milled this way without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Shask, Fading Soul
card.text: Players can't cast spells with mana value equal to Shask's power. {X}{W}, {T}: Put X +1/+1 counters on Shask. Activate only as a sorcery. {2}{U}, Remove one or more counters from Shask: Draw a card.

card.name: Vaquer's Last Day
card.text: Shuffle all nonbasic permanents into their owner's libraries. Then if a player has fewer than seven cards in hand, they draw cards equal to the difference. Exile Vaquer's Last Day.

card.name: Turan, Renowned Exorcist
card.text: Whenever one or more cards are put into exile from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on Turan. This ability triggers only once each turn. {G}{W}: Exile target card from a graveyard. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Lure of the Light
card.text: At the beginning of combat on each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. You choose which of those creatures attack and how those creatures block this combat.

card.name: Eksta, Slayer of Finality
card.text: Ward—Pay 6 life Other creatures you control have "At the beginning of your first main phase, you may tap this creature to add one mana of any color and put a +1/+1 counter on it." {4}{R}{G}: Eksta fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Tiren Katabas
card.text: [+2]: Untap up to one target creature and/or land you control. Until your next turn, a creature chosen this way becomes a Forest land and a land chosen this way becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with vigilance, haste, and hexproof that's still a land. [-X]: Exile the top X cards of your library. You may play cards exiled this way until the end of your next turn. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Lands you control have indestructible and ‘{T}: Create three Treasure tokens.'"

card.name: Deadness Others Had to Burn
card.text: (As this Elegy enters and whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield during your turn, add a lore counter. Sacrifice this Elegy after IV.) I, II, III — This Elegy gains "Whenever a creature you control dies, that creature deals 1 damage to each opponent." IV — Return up to one target creature card put into a graveyard from anywhere this turn to the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value. ​

card.name: Float Upon Your Wat'ry Bier
card.text: (As this Elegy enters and whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield during your turn, add a lore counter. Sacrifice this Elegy after V.) I — Return each nonland permanent your opponents control to their owner's hands. II, III, IV — Surveil 2, then draw two cards. V — Take an extra turn after this one. Exile this Elegy and your graveyard.

card.name: The Death of the Poet
card.text: (As this Elegy enters and whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield during your turn, add a lore counter. Sacrifice this Elegy after IV.) I, II — Draw two cards, then discard two cards. III — Exile a card from your graveyard. IV — You may cast an instant, sorcery, or Elegy card exiled with this Elegy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Better to Have Loved and Lost
card.text: (As this Elegy enters and whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield during your turn, add a lore counter. Sacrifice this Elegy after III.) I — Exile each other nonland permanent with mana value 2 or less until this Elegy leaves the battlefield. Lore counters can't be added to this Elegy until end of turn. II, III — Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control for each permanent card exiled with this Elegy. ​

card.name: Under That Blind Red Wall
card.text: (As this Elegy enters and whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield, add a lore counter during your turn. Sacrifice this Elegy after III.) I, II — Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. It gains haste and "When this creature enters, it fights up to one other target creature." Sacrifice it when this Elegy leaves the battlefield. III — Destroy all artifacts. For each artifact destroyed this way, create a tapped Treasure token. ​

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a Spirit creature with base power and toughness 1/1 named Spirit. When this Aura enters, surveil 1.

card.name: Contemplate Calamity
card.text: Insanity — Choose one. If two or more cards were put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, choose one or more instead. • Surveil 3. • Draw a card.

card.name: Deny Knowledge
card.text: Counter target spell. If that spell had mana value 3 or less, surveil 2.

card.name: Hide Your Face
card.text: This spell costs {4} less to cast if it targets a creature you control. Put up to one target creature an opponent controls and up to one target creature you control on top of their owner's libraries. Then you and that player each surveil 1.

card.name: Snowfield Traveler
card.text: When this creature enters, resound. (Trigger any number of resound abilities among permanents you control. Do this only once each turn.) Resound — Surveil 1.

card.name: Overtaken Exorcist
card.text: First strike This creature has double strike as long as its attacking.

card.name: Cautious Farmhand
card.text: Vigilance Paragon — Whenever this creature attacks, if you control a creature with power different than each other creature's power, tap target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Safekeeper Guard
card.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token. {W}, {T}, Sacrifice this creature: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Forlorn Vestige
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, resound. (Trigger any number of resound abilities among creatures you control. Do this only once each turn.) Resound — Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.

card.name: Ritegiver
card.text: Whenever a creature you control dies, you may exile it. If you do, create a Treasure token. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Uplifting Leader
card.text: Vigilance Paragon — {3}{W}: Up to two target creatures you control gain flying until end of turn. Activate only once each turn and only if you control a creature with power different than each other creature's power.

card.name: Heretical Coven
Deliverance
card.text: Choose one — • Deal 3 damage to target attacking creature. • Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures this turn.

card.name: Watchful Lingering
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, gains vigilance, and can't attack you or block creatures you control.

card.name: Twilit Encounter
card.text: Create two 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens. You gain 2 life.

card.name: The Silencers of Amel
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen — • For each card type, each player exiles a card of that type from their graveyard. • Each player draws two cards and loses 2 life, then mills two cards. • Each player returns a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Whispered Demise
card.text: For each opponent, destroy all creatures that player controls unless they have you control them during their next turn. Exile Whispered Demise. (You see all cards that player could see and make all decisions for them.)

card.name: Idra, Voracious Drowner
card.text: Idra can't be blocked by creatures with power less than the number of counters on her. Whenever Idra enters or attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on her. Then she fights up to one other target creature.

card.name: Elne, Starfall Prophet
card.text: Haste {1}{R}: If Elne is a Peasant, it becomes a 2/2 Human Cleric and gains flying. {2}{R}{R}: If Elne is a Cleric, it becomes a 4/4 Human Warlock and gains "When this creature dies, destroy up to one target nonbasic land."

card.name: Lis, Heretic of Bounds
card.text: Whenever Lis becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, change a target of that spell or ability. Whenever a player casts a spell during another player's turn, draw a card.

card.name: Bare the Soul
card.text: You may cast this spell as though it had flash if you pay {U} more to cast it. Look at the X cards from the top of your library. Choose up to three of those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Pinnacle Haunt
card.text: Deathtouch When this creature enters or it leaves your graveyard during your turn, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, each player loses 2 life.

card.name: Emptied Court
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill three cards. Put a card from among them into your hand and lose 3 life.

card.name: Wanderers in Mist
card.text: Menace When this creature enters, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. {3}{B}{B}, Discard a card: Return this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Crypt Forest Hungerer
card.text: When this creature enters, sacrifice any number of permanents, then draw cards equal to the number of permanents you've sacrificed this turn. Cull (You may cast a copy of this card from your graveyard by exiling it. Each token you sacrifice pays for {1} to cast it this way. The copy becomes a token.)

card.name: Doomswear
card.text: Destroy target creature. If you controlled that creature, draw two cards. Otherwise, lose life equal to twice its mana value.

card.name: The Harvest's Invitation
card.text: When this enchantment enters, create X 1/1 colorless Spirit creature tokens. Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Rise from Silt
card.text: Return up to three target creature cards with total mana value 6 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Mist-Mourner
card.text: As long as this creature is untapped, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to it. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Ilhamuer, Newborn
card.text: Reach {1}{G}, {T}: Untap all other permanents. Activate only once each turn. {X}{X}{G}: Target creature gets +X/+X and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: World's Edge Guide
card.text: Paragon — Whenever this creature enters or attacks, if you control a creature with power different than each other creature's power, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Autumnfell Spirit

card.name: Citadel Claimant
card.text: Trample When this creature enters, exile any number of permanent cards from your graveyard. Distribute that many +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures. Then if seven or more cards were exiled this way, creatures you control gain trample and haste until end of turn.

card.name: Persistent Roots
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent When this Aura enters, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. When this Aura is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return it to its owners hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Boon Trader's Gift
card.text: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library. Then search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is the number of cards shuffled into a library this way. Reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Moribund Realm
card.text: Once during each of your turns, you may play a land or cast a permanent spell from your graveyard. At the beginning of your end step, you may mill five cards or shuffle five cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Perfidumancer
card.text: Whenever this creature attacks, choose target nontoken creature with power less than or equal to the number of cards you've discarded this turn. Tap it and gain control of it until end of turn. It's attacking an opponent or planeswalker an opponent controls of your choice.

card.name: Kovara of the Ember Sun
card.text: Menace Whenever Kovara deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice that many permanents. If you do, untap each creature you control with power less than Kovara's power. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile the top card of their library. Then that player may have this enchantment deal 3 damage to them. If they don't, you may play that card until the end of your next turn and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.

card.name: Starfall Epiphany
card.text: Discard your hand, then draw three cards and create a Treasure token.

card.name: Metanoia's Hunt
card.text: Shuffle your library, then exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a creature card. You may put that card and up to one creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. They gain haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice those creatures. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.
